confirmation-remove.title: Confirmation
confirmation-remove.message: Are you sure that you want to remove the selected item(s)?

drag-and-drop-file: Drag and drop file here or click to upload

exceptions.insufficient-permission: You do not have permission to access the requested view.  Please contact your system administrator if you require access.
exceptions.oauth-error: An error occurred while attempting to authenticate with the OAuth provider: {error}

last-administrator: You cannot remove the administrator role as this identity is the last administrator.

messages.no-items: There are no items to display.
messages.oauth-unknown-identity: Unknown identity '{identityName}' received from OAuth provider.  Please contact a system administrator if you require access.
messages.oauth-unknown-identity-registered: Unknown identity '{identityName}' received from OAuth provider.  This identity has been submitted for registration.  Please wait a few seconds and then try logging in again.
messages.password-changed: Identity password has been changed successfully.
messages.request-sent: The request has been submitted.  It may take a moment to process.
messages.working: Please wait until the current operation completes and then try again.

name: Name
password-mismatch: Your new password must must the new confirmation password.
permission-required: You do not have permission to access the requested route.
identity-required: No identities have been registered.  You will be registered as an administrator.
